Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.

    DOF Condominium Comparable Rental Income in NYC

    DOE High School Programs 2014-2015

    Directory of NYC High School programs

    DOE High School Directory 2013-2014

    Directory of NYC High Schools.

    DOE High School Directory 2013-2014

    DOE Building Space Usage

    List of DOE buildings schools housed within the building and with listing of rooms by size, usage.

    DOB Violations

    Violations that have been issued by the Department of Buildings. There may also be an ECB violation. (https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Housing-Development/DOB-ECB-Violations/6bgk-3dad)

    DOB Stalled Construction Sites

    A list of sites across the five boroughs where a complaint was made that construction activity has come to an abrupt halt. Daily updates provide all sites where the stalled status is currently active.

    DOB License Info

    DOB licenses and registrations issued by the Department to individuals working with our Department and/or within the construction trades in New York City

    DOB ECB Violations

    Violations by the Department of Buildings that are adjudicated by OATH/ECB. There may also be a DOB violation. (https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Housing-Development/DOB-Violations/3h2n-5cm9)
